Defeated the dead ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thargaun is in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should talk to Thargaun.
The artifact is not here
The artifact you seek is somewhere in Cirith Ungol.\n\nYou should search one more location where the artifact might be.
The strange pile of dust can be found in Cirith Ungol.\n\nYou should examine the pile of dust.
The scratch marks lead into Torech Ungol.\n\nYou should follow the scratch marks.

'You have succeeded in this first trial and the destruction of Orb of Wrath. Now the time has come to find the second artifact. Our scholars have continued their studies of the text and have concluded that it can be found upon the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul. We shall search for it at once!'
For those reclaiming Minas Ithil from the grasp of darkness, a trial of sorrow has begun.
The Orb of Sorrow can be found in Torech Ungol.\n\nTry to resist the visions of sorrow.

'[placeholder], you have returned. It has been a while and I feared you lost! What news of you about the second artifact?\n\n'I see, you travelled to Cirith Ungol and undertook a trial of sorrow. I am glad you were able to overcome a trial such as this. It must have been a heavy burden to shoulder alone.'
Shades and wights can be found in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should defeat shades and wights in Minas Morgul.
Find and defeat Thargaun

'I grow weary of our confrontations! You must have realized by now that I can not be defeated.\n\n'Yes, I know the artifact you seek. Why ever would you care about such a useless trinket! No matter, you will never find it here in the city, [placeholder]. I have hidden it away, with Ungwet√°ri's brood. Search for it! That search will only lead to your death. Then I will finally be rid of you!'
The Orb of Sorrow can be found in Torech Ungol.\n\nTry to resist the visions of sorrow.
